Uses of Package
com.aevi.payment

  • Packages that use com.aevi.payment 
    Package Description
    com.aevi.authentication
    This package provides classes for performing a user authentication request to the Device.
    com.aevi.helpers
    This package provides helper classes and an overview of the available permissions.
    com.aevi.payment
    This package provides classes for integrating payment functionality in third-party applications.
  • Classes in com.aevi.payment used by com.aevi.authentication 
    Class and Description
    AeviRequestDataMissingException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to obtain request information (i.e.
  • Classes in com.aevi.payment used by com.aevi.helpers 
    Class and Description
    AeviRequestDataMissingException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to obtain request information (i.e.
  • Classes in com.aevi.payment used by com.aevi.payment 
    Class and Description
    AccountType
    Defines the types of account allowed for the Card.
    AeviRequest
    Base class for the different request types.
    AeviRequestDataMissingException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to obtain request information (i.e.
    ApplicationState
    Part of a PaymentAppConfiguration this enum describes the state of the payment application or simulator.
    CardEntryType
    Defines the types of capture method for the Card.
    CardType
    Defines the card types.
    CompletionRequest
    Part of a PreAuthorisationRequest, this request completes a previously made pre-authorisation request.
    DepositRequest
    The DepositRequest object represents a single deposit request made to the Aevi payment application.
    FinancialRequest
    Base class for the different financial request types.
    MerchantInfo
    This class contains the details for a single Merchant.
    MoToPaymentRequest
    A MoToPaymentRequest can be used to set up a credit card transaction without the card holder present.
    MoToRefundRequest
    A MoToPaymentRequest can be used to set up a credit card refund without the card holder present.
    MoToRequestType
    Part of a MoToPaymentRequest, this enum describes the way the MoToPayment was communicated.
    PaymentAppConfiguration
    Returned by the payment application following a startActivityForResult using the PaymentAppConfigurationRequest.
    PaymentRequest
    The PaymentRequest object represents a single payment request made to the Aevi payment application.
    PaymentStatus
    Enum used for sending extra print information along with a payment AeviRequest
    PreAuthorisationRequest
    The PreAuthorisationRequest object represents payment reservation request made to the Aevi payment application.
    ReceiptType
    Enum used for sending extra print information along with a payment AeviRequest
    RefundRequest
    A RefundRequest can be used to set up a refund transaction with the payment application.
    ReversalRequest
    The ReversalRequest object represents a single reversal request made to the payment application.
    TokenRequest
    The TokenRequest object represents a token request made to the Aevi payment application.
    TransactionErrorCode
    Part of a TransactionResult, this enum describes the detailed error state the in case of a transaction process fault.
    TransactionReferenceCode
    Part of a TransactionReferences, this class contains a single reference number associated with a transaction.
    TransactionReferences
    Part of a TransactionResult, this class contains identifier numbers associated with a transaction.
    TransactionResult
    Returned by the payment application after a transaction has been completed.
    TransactionStatus
    Part of a TransactionResult, this enum describes the state the transaction after control was returned to the calling application.
    TransactionType
    This enum describes the different transaction available in the Aevi API.
